name: Just Blanka Thoughts
description:
A VERY brief glimpse into the mind of everyone's favourite green rolling zappy boi

This  game   visual novel  thing was made after a bad bout of insomnia. And that should pretty much tell you everything you need to know going into this. It'll only take a minute or two to get through. Which is about as much sleep as I had had while making it.

I might add more Blanka thoughts if/when they occur. Feel free to send me your ideas too. If i like them i will include and credit.

NOTE: Game doesn't run well in Safari. Firefox/Chrome recommended.

Made by lazytiger in renpy 
Music by Jay_You
Blanka is ©Capcom
